item.title: Matrix Operations
item.description: very WIP Identity Matrix Translation 1 2 3 4 5 vector t = chv('translate'); matrix T = set(set(1, 0, 0, 0), set(0, 1, 0, 0), set(0, 0, 1, 0), set(t.

item.title: primuv and xyzdist
item.description: sources / further reading: The joy of xyzdist() and primuv() - Toadstorm Joy Of Vex 19 - cgwiki 1 Minute VEX II - Aaron Smith

item.title: Quaternions & Euler, Radians & Degrees
item.description: Quaternions expressed as 4 numbers `vector4 = [x, y, z, w] It’s usually used to define rotational transformation in 3D Space.

item.title: VEX Snippets
item.description: Wrangle Cheat Sheet I try my best to credit and link to any sources. That being said, some of those are pretty old and I have no idea where they came from.
